subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Javelin thrower Breaux Greer made the United States track and field team for the Beijing Games even though he failed to reach the final round at the Olympic trials. He was placed on the team, USA Track & Field said, based on a rule that allows for “the selection of an injured athlete who competed in the Olympic trials but did not final ... as long as another athlete is not displaced from the team.”.
